title: Tuesday Post Show (09-28-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (09-28-21)
description:
Bobby gives an update on him wearing the tail for the last 24 hours. He said some people came over to his house and he never explained it. We listen to the Neon Moon remix and decide whether it’s good or not. We also check in with Lunchbox who is out digging for diamonds in Arkansas. Bobby also reads a story about how where you sit in class has no effect on your performance. There was also a story about a man who picked up his girlfriend with his mom’s body in the trunk.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
